entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
